controller

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Factory

  • public abstract class Factory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a design patern Factory

    It have to create object in few method to simplify the code when a constructor is modified.

    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Antoine Savalle
    See Also:
    Controller, ControllerDB, ControllerDAO
